stories.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
stories.shortDescription: A proud hare challenges a slow tortoise to a race—and learns that steady effort wins.
stories.moral: Slow and steady wins the race.

stories.title: The Lion and the Mouse
stories.shortDescription: A lion spares a mouse, and later the mouse repays the kindness in an unexpected way.
stories.moral: No act of kindness is ever wasted.

stories.title: The Fox and the Grapes
stories.shortDescription: A fox cannot reach grapes and pretends he never wanted them.
stories.moral: It is easy to despise what you cannot get.

stories.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
stories.shortDescription: A shepherd boy lies about a wolf until no one believes him when danger is real.
stories.moral: Liars are not believed even when they speak the truth.

stories.title: The Ant and the Grasshopper
stories.shortDescription: The ant prepares for winter while the grasshopper plays and learns too late.
stories.moral: Work today for what you need tomorrow.

stories.title: The Dog and the Shadow
stories.shortDescription: A dog loses his meat while trying to grab more from a reflection.
stories.moral: Do not be greedy for more than you have.

stories.title: The Goose That Laid the Golden Eggs
stories.shortDescription: A man destroys his fortune by greed when his goose lays golden eggs.
stories.moral: Greed destroys the source of good.

stories.title: The Bundle of Sticks
stories.shortDescription: A father teaches his sons that unity is strength using a bundle of sticks.

stories.title: The Lion and the Boar
stories.shortDescription: Two rivals fight over water until they realize a greater danger is watching.
stories.moral: In conflict, both sides may lose.

stories.title: The North Wind and the Sun
stories.shortDescription: The wind and sun compete to remove a man’s coat; gentleness wins over force.
stories.moral: Gentleness and kind persuasion win where force fails.

stories.title: The Farmer and His Sons
stories.shortDescription: A farmer teaches his sons that hard work is the real treasure.

stories.title: The Crow and the Pitcher
stories.shortDescription: A crow cleverly raises the water level in a pitcher using stones.
stories.moral: Necessity is the mother of invention.
